data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ermilov, Sergey G., Hugo-Coetzee, Elizabeth A. (2019): Redescriptions and species status of the South African mites Galumna lawrencei Jacot, 1940 and Galumna natalensis Jacot, 1940 (Acari, Oribatida, Galumnidae), with lectotype designation. Zootaxa 4568 (3): 581-586, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4568.3.11
